current_state: Single point of failure; all project knowledge resides with one developer. High risk if the developer becomes unavailable.
recommended_action: Schedule mandatory weekly pair programming sessions between the primary developer and the Tech Lead. Enforce a strict documentation standard for all schema design choices in the repository's README or wiki.
expected_benefit: Reduces key-person dependency risk by 50%. Ensures a backup resource is familiar with the codebase, reducing potential project delay from 100% to 20% in case of absence.
success_metrics: Tech Lead can successfully review and approve PRs without significant clarification. Documentation is up-to-date at the end of each sprint.
roi_calculation: Mitigates risk of project stall valued at the entire project cost.
